description:
net/http: provide a means to disable 100-continue support

This isn't beautiful, but I imagined the alternatives (a hook
function on the Server type) would be also gross.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

subject: code review 6945049: net/http: provide a means to disable 100-continue support
